Jx.Field.Check

Extends: Jx.Field

This class represents a radio input field.

Example

Summary
Jx.Field.CheckExtends: Jx.Field
Options
templateThe template used for rendering this field
checkedWhether this field is checked or not
Functions
renderCreates a checkbox input field.
setValueSets the value property of the field
getValueReturns the current value of the field. 
resetSets the field back to the value passed in the original options. 



Options



template
The template used for rendering this field



checked
Whether this field is checked or not



Functions



render
render : function ()
Creates a checkbox input field.



setValue
setValue : function (v)
Sets the value property of the field
Parameters
vWhether the box shouldbe checked or not.  “checked” or “true” if it should be checked.



getValue
getValue : function ()
Returns the current value of the field.  The field must be “checked” in order to return a value.  Otherwise it returns null.



reset
reset : function ()
Sets the field back to the value passed in the original options. no IE hack is implemented because the field should already be in the DOM when this is called.









Extends: Jx.Widget
render : function ()
Creates a checkbox input field.
setValue : function (v)
Sets the value property of the field
getValue : function ()
Returns the current value of the field. 
reset : function ()
Sets the field back to the value passed in the original options.
